name: ChildStory
description:
Sonya and the Album

Every month, the girl Sonya comes to the polar town of Albom to eat the Moon again and continue the cycle.




Compose!

  • The main character of the game is a small but resourceful adventurer! Sonya will find a way out of any situation. Using improvised tools and objects, make your way through an unfriendly and cold world.
  • Make friends with charming characters in the Album city and taste cotton candy! Who knows, maybe you'll become best friends?
  • Sonya, like all people, doubts what she is doing. What will she learn from this special cycle that the PLAYER will help her create?

Fight!

  • Challenge the ancient spirits and monsters of the Album to test your strength!
  • Boss battles are made in the genre of the good old bullet hell! We'll have to destroy the SPACE BAR!
  • Keep an eye on your health points, have a snack on time, and remember to be safe when working with resin!

Solve it!

  • Solve the riddles of Nora, the grumpy witch who rolls out her moon circle every month.
  • Explore a mysterious fantasy world. You can find unique areas and you can meet cute creatures there. Interact with various characters, help them find the meaning of life. Or destroy everything they hold dear.
  • The New Star Festival will be held in the city soon. Become a part of it, plunging into an unforgettable winter atmosphere.
